channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiClientWindows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiClientWindows

item.title: CVE-2022-40681|2024-08-30T18:06:47.506Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A incorrect authorization in Fortinet FortiClient (Windows) 7.0.0 - 7.0.7, 6.4.0 - 6.4.9, 6.2.0 - 6.2.9 and 6.0.0 - 6.0.10 allows an attacker to cause denial of service via sending a crafted request to a specific named pipe.

item.title: CVE-2023-33304|2024-08-30T18:11:16.400Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability in Fortinet FortiClient Windows 7.0.0 - 7.0.9 and 7.2.0 - 7.2.1 allows an attacker to bypass system protections via the use of static credentials.
